attributes.long-description:
No rules, no boundaries, racing is sheer fun. Find yourself behind the wheels of off-road vehicles in 4x4 Jam, the most unique all-terrain off-road racing game. Jump over your opponent or roll down a steep hill the realistic physics system puts a smile upon your face.

4x4 Jam really offers 100% freedom to race across the varied terrains without any limitations. Challenge your opponents on icy mountains or hot sand dunes and enjoy hill climbing with custom build off-road vehicles.

FEATURES
- career mode with 32 events
- five unique gamemodes
- eight custom built vehicles
- numerous camera angles with cockpit view
- four unique paint jobs for each vehicles
- player profiles up to 8 players
- high detailed 3D graphics
- real but enjoyable physics
- realistic off-road vehicle characteristics
- various difficulty levels
- high score and best lap time records
- vast terrains without boundaries
- intelligent opponents
- 9 licensed music tracks

All rights reserved - Invictus Games Ltd. 2010

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not purchase or use this item. This item has been sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America. One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 console systems and 2 portable systems that are associated with the purchasing account.
attributes.name: 4x4 Jam
